sense.gloss: to wake (someone) up (by calling for them), to awaken
to call (to mind), to bring back (memories), to evoke, to arouse (e.g. interest)

sdata.j: ↑戦↑↓たたか↓いは↑人間↑↓にんげん↓の↑獣性↑↓じゅうせい↓を|よびおこす|。
sdata.e: War arouses the animal in man.

sdata.j: 「↑家↑↓いえ↓」という↑単語↑↓たんご↓は、↑草木↑↓くさき↓に↑囲↑↓かこ↓まれ、↑幸↑↓しあわ↓せな↑家族↑↓かぞく↓が↑住↑↓す↓んでいる↑屋根↑↓やね↓や↑煙突↑↓えんとつ↓がある↑長方形↑↓ちょうほうけい↓の↑建物↑↓たてもの↓、という↑心象↑↓しんしょう↓を↑呼↑↓|よ↓び↑起↑↓お↓こす|。
sdata.e: The word "house" evokes the mental image of a rectangular building with a roof and smoking chimney, which may be surrounded by grass and trees and inhabited by a happy family.
